doc:
Louis Bennison https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Bennison 0 Louis Bennison (October 17, 1884 – June 9, 1929) was an American stage and silent film actor, known for westerns. Born in Oakland, he attended the University of California, and performed in plays such as The Unchastened Woman and Johnny Get Your Gun. His films include Damaged Goods (1914), Pretty Mrs. Smith (1915), Oh, Johnny! (1918) and Speedy Meade (1919). In the 1920s he developed a relationship with actress Margaret Lawrence, and on June 9, 1929, the two were found dead in Lawrence's New York apartment, the result of a murder-suicide. Louis_Bennison ( October_17_,_1884 – June_9_,_1929 ) was an_American_stage and silent_film_actor , known for westerns . Born in Oakland , he attended the_University of California , and performed in plays such_as The_Unchastened_Woman_and_Johnny Get Your_Gun . His_films include Damaged_Goods_(_1914_) , Pretty_Mrs._Smith_(_1915_) , Oh , Johnny ! (_1918_) and Speedy_Meade_(_1919_) . In the_1920s he developed a_relationship with actress_Margaret_Lawrence , and on June_9_,_1929 , the_two were_found dead in Lawrence 's_New_York_apartment , the_result of a_murder-suicide .
